channel.title: Jenkins on CINQ ICT Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Jenkins on CINQ ICT Tech Blog

item.title: Building a Jenkins development Docker image
item.description: While developing my Jenkinsfile and init Groovy scripts, I needed a Jenkins Docker image that I could launch and destroy easily with a minimal amount of manual interaction. To my surprise, I needed to google multiple references to set this up. Enough reason for me to share my findings and results. Jenkins offers a official Docker image jenkins/jenkins. This is a good starting point to create your own image since it contains an extensive readme with al kinds of code snippets that you can use in your Dockerfile.
